sentences.en: A spasm of pain brought his thoughts back to the present.
sentences.cn: 一阵剧痛把他的思绪拉回到了现在。

sentences.en: After the pain of defeat passes, England have some thinking to do.
sentences.cn: 失败的痛苦过去以后，英国人应该认真反思一下。

sentences.en: Greg was in a lot of pain .
sentences.cn: 格雷格疼痛万分。

sentences.en: Greg was in a lot of pain.
sentences.cn: 格雷格疼痛万分。

sentences.en: He complained a little of a nagging pain between his shoulder blades.
sentences.cn: 他有几句提到说肩胛骨之间一直在疼。

sentences.en: He screwed his face into an expression of mock pain.
sentences.cn: 他面部扭曲，假装疼痛。

sentences.en: He was struck by a stabbing pain in his midriff.
sentences.cn: 他突然感到腹部一阵剧烈疼痛。

sentences.en: he was sued for his pains.
sentences.cn: 他辛苦一场反遭起诉。

sentences.en: I felt a sharp pain in my lower back.
sentences.cn: 我感觉到后腰一阵剧痛。

sentences.en: I have recently been suffering from pain and numbness in my hands.
sentences.cn: 我近来双手一直疼痛麻木。

sentences.en: Our instinctive reaction when someone causes us pain is to strike back.
sentences.cn: 当被别人弄疼时我们本能的反应是反击。

sentences.en: Pain is the body's way of telling us that something is wrong.
sentences.cn: 疼痛是身体在告诉我们有地方出问题了。

sentences.en: She had to cling onto the doorhandle until the pain passed.
sentences.cn: 她不得不抓紧门把手，直到那阵疼痛过去。

sentences.en: She lay at the bottom of the stairs, whimpering in pain.
sentences.cn: 她躺在楼梯底部，痛得呜咽着。

sentences.en: Stimulate the site of greatest pain with a small negative current.
sentences.cn: 以微弱负电流刺激疼得最厉害的部位。

sentences.en: the pain and grief of bereavement
sentences.cn: 丧亲之痛

sentences.en: The pain had lessened in the night, but so had his lucidity.
sentences.cn: 夜里他的痛苦是减轻了，但人也不那么清醒了。

sentences.en: The pain is getting worse.
sentences.cn: 疼得越来越厉害了。

sentences.en: The pain originated from a point in his right thigh.
sentences.cn: 疼痛是从他右大腿的某处开始的。

sentences.en: the pleasures and pains of growing old
sentences.cn: 变老的苦与乐

sentences.en: they proscribed all such practices and observances on pain of death.
sentences.cn: 他们禁止所有这类风俗习惯，违者处死。

sentences.en: This public acknowledgment of Ted's disability pained my mother.
sentences.cn: 特德残疾的公开使我母亲感到痛苦。

sentences.en: We were forbidden, under pain of imprisonment, to use our native language.
sentences.cn: 我们被禁止使用母语，违者将被关进监狱。

words.tran_cn: 痛苦的；疼痛的；令人不快的

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)作为对努力或辛苦的不公平的报酬

phrases.phrase: on pain of 或 under pain of
phrases.tran_cn: 违则以…处罚：应受一种指定惩罚的刑罚，如死刑

trans.tran_en: the feeling you have when part of your body hurts
If a fact or idea pains you, it makes you feel upset and disappointed
